message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I understand its value to you might be around $120. To maximize my earnings while ensuring you get a great deal, I propose we start at $135. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
